Hidden.description: Smash and rebuild 4 Skeleton Siege Shields and 3 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield.

Hidden.name: Let's Bounce!
Hidden.description: Smash and rebuild 2 Skeleton Catapults and 5 Skeleton Bouncers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

Hidden.name: Smash Some Scents 2
Hidden.description: Smash 5 Lightning Blossoms, 5 Fire Blossoms and 5 Bamboo around the Monastery.

Hidden.name: Smash Some Scents 1
Hidden.description: Smash 5 Ice Blossoms, 5 Earth Blossoms and 5 Bamboo around the Monastery.

Hidden.name: Mud in Your Mouth
Hidden.description: Toshiro Gojira wants a Dirt Sandwich and a Chilly Freezesteak from Johnny Umami.

Hidden.name: Acquired Tastes
Hidden.description: Hari Howzen wants 1 order of Yucki-Yaki and 2 Bento Blocks from Johnny Umami.

Hidden.name: Trapped! Again!
Hidden.description: Rescue all 6 of the Ninjago Villagers from the Skeleton Cages in the Ninjago Caves.

Hidden.name: Protect the Monastery!
Hidden.description: Collect all 4 Elemental Dragon Relics from the 4 Gardens in the Monastery, then return to Sensei Wu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: In the Hood
Ninjago Monastery.description: Buy a Ki Filled Hood from Tomoko Moonstone in the Ninjago Monastery and equip it.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Lanterns of Spinjitzu
Ninjago Monastery.description: Interact with the Earth Spinjitzu Lantern near Cole in the Dojo of Earth to use its power.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Man the Walls!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Cole wants you to talk to Kodo Pandaheart, the Guard outside the Monastery Gates.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Report to Cole
Ninjago Monastery.description: Return to Cole in the Monastery Dojo of Earth.

Ninjago Monastery.name: See the Sensei!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use one of the side gates to get inside the Monastery. Then speak to Sensei Wu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Unleash Spinjitzu!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Hold the attack button to charge your Spinjitzu - then release the button to unleash a Spinjitzu attack in front of Sensei Wu!

Ninjago Monastery.name: Made from Maelstrom
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Troopers and Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve 5 Maelstrom Daggers.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Scare the Skeletons!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash 5 Maelstrom Weapon Crates on the Ninjago Battlefield, then Quick Build them into surprises for the Skeletons.

Ninjago Monastery.name: A Better Bone Bucket
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Marksmen on the Ninjago Battlefield and retrieve all 3 pages of the Bone Bucket Instructions.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Modder of Invention
Ninjago Monastery.description: Buy a Monastery Flag Banner Model from Bubu Mumu in the Monastery, then take it back to Jay.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Air Ninja!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash and rebuild the Bone Buckets on 3 Skeleton Catapults on the Ninjago Battlefield.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Rung Way
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Ladders on the Ninjago Battlefield and rebuild them into Bouncers.

Ninjago Monastery.name: A Sharp Idea
Ninjago Monastery.description: Buy a Sharp Kunai from Nya and 3 Bancha Tea from Johnny Umami in the Monastery. Then take them back to Kai.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Target Practice
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash 5 Skeleton Shields on the Ninjago Battlefield, then rebuild them into Archery Targets to launch Kai's Imagination arrows.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Ninja of Earth
Ninjago Monastery.description: Sensei Wu wants you to speak to Cole. Find him in the Monastery Dojo of Earth.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Student of Earth
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Earth Ninja kit.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Danger Below!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Cole wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Ninja of Lightning
Ninjago Monastery.description: Sensei Wu wants you to speak with Jay. Find him in the Monastery Dojo of Lightning.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Bozu's Hiding Spot
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find Bozu Roku, who is hiding in the first cave below the Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Trapped!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Rescue all 6 of the villagers in the Ninjago Caves.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Altars of Imagination
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash 7 piles of debris in the Ninjago Caves and rebuild each one into an Altar of Imagination.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Rest in Pieces
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash 10 Skeleton Coffins on the Ninjago Battlefield before the Skeletons can pop out!

Ninjago Monastery.name: Down They Fall
Ninjago Monastery.description: Destroy 2 Skeleton Siege Towers on the Ninjago Battlefield.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Metal
Ninjago Monastery.description: Show the Maelstrom Dagger to Vanda Darkflame in Nexus Tower.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Tools from Ghouls
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Marksmen and Commandos to get 1 Shoulder Socket Wrench, 3 Hammer Toes and 5 Finger Nails.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Diamond Power
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash rocks in the Ninjago Caves until you find a Diamond Gem, then take it back to Jay in the Dojo of Lightning.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Genius Jay
Ninjago Monastery.description: Tell Nya that Jay is almost done with the Portable Chaos Cleaner.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Zany Zane
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find the Dragon Mask in a treasure chest hidden in the alcoves of the Cave of Black Echoes, below the Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Face of the Dragon
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip the Dragon Mask so Zane can see how it looks.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cole Fear
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip the Dragon Mask and go to Cole in the Monastery Dojo of Earth. Then use the Speedchat menu to perform the Dragon Roar.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cowardly Cringe Lo
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find Cringe Lo, who is hiding somewhere in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cringe Lo in Love
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Fire Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery until you collect 10 pieces of Flame Fruit, then take them to Cringe Lo.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Dear Nya
Ninjago Monastery.description: Take Cringe Lo's Love Note to Nya in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cringe No
Ninjago Monastery.description: Go back to the Dojo of Lightning and tell Cringe Lo that Nya isn't interested in him.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cringe Lo Quits
Ninjago Monastery.description: Go to Bubu Mumu in the Ninjago Monastery and tell him that Cringe Lo has decided to quit his job.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cringe Lo the Brave
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find Cringe Lo in the Ninjago Caves below the Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Woofs are Scary
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Bone Wolves until you find a Lucky Wolf's Paw, then take it back to Cringe Lo in the Ninjago Caves.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Lo Down
Ninjago Monastery.description: Talk to Cringe Lo when he gets back to his hiding spot in the Dojo of Lightning.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cooking Lessons
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 5 Rock Fruit and a Hardtack Biscuit and take them back to Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Gems of Black
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 20 Onyx Gems by smashing rocks in the caves below the Monastery, then take them to Bubu Mumu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Bones for Urufu
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Troopers on the Ninjago Battlefield until you collect 10 Rib Bones, then take them back to Furious Urufu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Alpha Dog
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Bone Wolves until you find 15 Tail Bones, then take them back to Furious Urufu in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Bone's Eye
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Bonezai in the Ice Shrine below the Monastery, then bring his Eye Bone back to Furious Urufu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Funny Bone
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine below the Monastery and take his Funny Bone back to Furious Urufu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Jaw Breaker
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine below the Monastery and take his Jawbone back to Furious Urufu.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Treats for the Beast
Ninjago Monastery.description: Get 10 Rockolate Bars from Johnny Umami. You'll need to help him make them first.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Beast of Earth
Ninjago Monastery.description: Interact one of the Dragon statues in the Dojo of Earth. Then tame the pet that appears.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Oil and Vinegar, No Mayo
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 5 Shock Fruit, 1 Buttery Croissant and 1 Healing Drumstick for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Disgusting Delicacy
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find or buy 3 Stinky Fish, 1 Hiccup Tablet and 1 Cup of Yo for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Jeet Yet?
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 6 Frost Fruit, a bottle of Tough Buff Sauce and a BBQ Blast Hot Dog for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Munchy Crunchy
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 10 Bamboo Bites, 3 pieces of Sushi and 2 Tasty Fish for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Icy and Spicy
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 8 Flame Fruit, 8 Frost Fruit and 2 Cherry Blasts for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Rock Candy
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find 10 Rock Fruit, 5 Hot Chocolate, 5 Onyx Gems and 5 Bamboo Bites for Johnny Umami in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Scythe of Quakes
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find the Earth Shrine in the Ninjago Caves below the Monastery. Then defeat Chopov to recover the Scythe of Quakes.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Urufu's First Treasure
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the Ninjago rocket launchpad to find a treasure.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Urufu's Second Treasure
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig under the Ninjago Battlefield bridge to find a treasure.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Urufu's Third Treasure
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig beneath the Rock Face in the Earth Garden to find a treasure.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Urufu's Fourth Treasure
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the entrance to the Ninjago Caves to find a treasure.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Urufu's Fifth Treasure
Ninjago Monastery.description: Use a pet on the Pet Dig by the Black Banner in the Ninjago Caves to find a treasure.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Climb Like Cole
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find all 10 of Cole's Climbing Flags around the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Shurikens of Ice
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find the Ice Shrine in the Ninjago Caves below the Monastery. Then defeat Bonezai to recover the Shurikens of Ice.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Power of Earth
Ninjago Monastery.description: Get the Earth Key from the attic above the Dojo of Earth. Then use the Key to unlock the chest in front of Cole.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Power of Ice
Ninjago Monastery.description: Get the Ice Key from the attic above the Dojo of Ice. Then use the Key to unlock the chest in front of Zane.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Power of Lightning
Ninjago Monastery.description: Get the Lightning Key from the attic above the Dojo of Lightning. Then use the Key to unlock the chest in front of Jay.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Power of Fire
Ninjago Monastery.description: Get the Fire Key from the attic above the Dojo of Fire. Then use the Key to unlock the chest in front of Kai.

Ninjago Monastery.name: In Tents!
Ninjago Monastery.description: Scout the Ninjago Battlefield and find all 4 of the Skeletons' Camps.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Student of Lightning
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Lightning Ninja kit.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Back to Wu
Ninjago Monastery.description: Jay wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Nunchuks of Lightning
Ninjago Monastery.description: Find the Lightning Shrine in the Ninjago Caves below the Monastery. Then defeat Krazi to recover the Nunchuks of Lightning.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Secrets of the Skull-a-Tons
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Mad Scientists in the Ninjago Caves until you retrieve the 3 pages of the Skull-a-Ton Building Instructions.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Ninja of Ice
Ninjago Monastery.description: Sensei Wu wants you to speak to Zane. Find him in the Monastery Dojo of Ice.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Cool Guy
Ninjago Monastery.description: Return to Zane in the Monastery Dojo of Ice.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Student of Ice
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Ice Ninja kit.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Master is Waiting
Ninjago Monastery.description: Zane wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Ninja of Fire
Ninjago Monastery.description: Sensei Wu wants you to speak to Kai. Find him in the Monastery Dojo of Fire.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Student of Fire
Ninjago Monastery.description: Equip all 3 pieces of the Fire Ninja kit.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Burning for Wu
Ninjago Monastery.description: Kai wants you to return to Sensei Wu in the Ninjago Monastery.

Ninjago Monastery.name: The Sword of Fire
Ninjago Monastery.description: Interact with the red Dragon Statue in the Ninjago Caves to find the Fire Shrine. Then defeat Frakjaw to recover the Sword of Fire.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 5
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Chopov in the Earth Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Dark Blade, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 6
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Krazi in the Lightning Shrine until he drops a Maelstrom Bone, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 3
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Commandos on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Bone Axe, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 1
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Blacksmiths on the Ninjago Battlefield until you retrieve a Maelstrom Blacksmith's Hammer, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 2
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Raiders in the Ninjago Caves until you find a Maelstrom Double Bone Dagger, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 7
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Frakjaw in the Fire Shrine until he drops his Maelstrom Mace, then take it back to Nya.

Ninjago Monastery.name: Maelstrom Weapons Part 4
Ninjago Monastery.description: Smash Skeleton Overseers in the Siege Towers until you retrieve a Maelstrom Double-Bladed Axe, then take it back to Nya.

Pet Cove.name: Tame a Pet
Pet Cove.description: Interact with an animal in Pet Cove to start the Pet Taming mini-game.

Pet Cove.name: Fetch!
Pet Cove.description: Retrieve the flying disc and return it to Coalessa. Interact with a Pet while standing on a Pet Bouncer.

Pet Cove.name: Master Pet Tamer
Pet Cove.description: Tame 7 pets and return to Coalessa in Pet Cove. Look on different worlds for different kinds of Pets!

Pet Cove.name: King of Beasts
Pet Cove.description: Tame 18 different Pets, then return to Coalessa.

Pet Cove.name: Lost Tags
Pet Cove.description: Find all 5 Dog Tags around Pet Cove for Bella Pepper.

Pet Cove.name: Can you dig it?
Pet Cove.description: Interact with your Pet while standing next to a buried treasure chest.

Pet Cove.name: Mardolf Knows
Pet Cove.description: Talk to Mardolf the Orange in Nimbus Station.

Pet Cove.name: Dino's Delight
Pet Cove.description: Find 50 bananas and 5 Healing Cherries and take them back to Coalessa in Pet Cove.

Pet Cove.name: Close Encounter
Pet Cove.description: Search the Venture Explorer for the 3 Alien pieces, then return to Vanda Darkflame in Nexus Tower.

Pet Cove.name: The Bone Collector
Pet Cove.description: Smash Skeleton Miners on Crux Prime until you find 4 fossilized bones, then take them back to Dr. Overbuild.

Pet Cove.name: Sundae Sundae Sundae!
Pet Cove.description: Take the Stegosaurus Treat back to Hael Storm in Nexus Tower.

Pet Cove.name: Nest Egg
Pet Cove.description: Put the egg in the seagull's nest on top of the Pet Cove Lighthouse.

Pet Cove.name: Grab a Gryphon
Pet Cove.description: Tame the Gryphon pet in Pet Cove.

Venture Explorer.name: Your Creative Spark
Venture Explorer.description: Collect 6 Imagination power-ups and return to Bob.

Venture Explorer.name: Not Enough Lifepods?
Venture Explorer.description: Smash crates to collect 3 rocket parts. You'll need a Nose Cone, a Cockpit and an Engine.

Venture Explorer.name: Bounce to Sky Lane
Venture Explorer.description: Quick Builds require Imagination. Quick Build a Bouncer and use it to talk to Sky Lane.

Venture Explorer.name: Wake Up Call
Venture Explorer.description: Talk to Bob on the center platform of the spaceship.

Venture Explorer.name: Escape the Venture Explorer
Venture Explorer.description: Build a rocket at the building area below, then use one of the launchers to escape. Talk to Wisp Lee when you land.

Venture Explorer.name: Venture into Knowledge
Venture Explorer.description: The orange circle at the top of the screen is the Mission Tracker. It shows your current objective.

Nimbus Station.name: Bust a move
Nimbus Station.description: Perform a dance emote for Skee Daddle at the Red Blocks concert. Use the Speedchat (!) button on the lower left.

Nimbus Station.name: Heavy Metal
Nimbus Station.description: Use the guitar on stage to play some metal riffs for Bjorn Fjord at the Red Blocks concert.

Nimbus Station.name: Yay for Spray!
Nimbus Station.description: Look around for Water Sprayer parts. Check the Red Blocks concert, Brick Annex and Pet Cove.

Nimbus Station.name: Crate Job!
Nimbus Station.description: Find a gun in Gnarled Forest and shoot down the crate in the tree near the Red Blocks concert.

Nimbus Station.name: Choose a Faction
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza. Then select a Faction to join!

Nimbus Station.name: Back to Nexus Jay
Nimbus Station.description: Tell Nexus Jay that you earned the approval of the Assembly Faction.

Nimbus Station.name: Find Mardolf the Orange
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Mardolf the Orange to earn approval from the Assembly Faction.

Nimbus Station.name: Find Johnny Thunder
Nimbus Station.description: Explore Nimbus Station and find Johnny Thunder to earn approval from the Venture League.

Nimbus Station.name: A Thunderous Collection
Nimbus Station.description: Find 3 floating treasure chests hidden around Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Pants Party!
Nimbus Station.description: Get some Party Pants from the Concert vendor for Milo Snackpigeon.

Nimbus Station.name: Get your Assembly Gear!
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Meldric Steamvalve in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!

Nimbus Station.name: Get your Venture League Gear!
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Magnus Bumperdent in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!

Nimbus Station.name: Get your Paradox Gear!
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Cog Blammo in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!

Nimbus Station.name: Get your Sentinel Faction Gear!
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Xeno Blueblade in Nimbus Plaza and pick your first Specialty Kit!

Nimbus Station.name: Thirsty Work
Nimbus Station.description: Use Faction Tokens to buy a Sentinel Super Soda from your Faction Vendor, then take the Soda back to Nexus Jay.

Nimbus Station.name: Heartthrob
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to 4 female fans at the Red Blocks concert about meeting Johnny Thunder.

Nimbus Station.name: Sofie Loves Thunder
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Sofie Cushion at the Red Blocks concert about meeting Johnny Thunder.

Nimbus Station.name: DeeDee Loves Thunder
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to DeeDee Light at the Red Blocks concert about meeting Johnny Thunder.

Nimbus Station.name: Brockley Loves Thunder
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Green Brockley at the Red Blocks concert about meeting Johnny Thunder.

Nimbus Station.name: Krista Loves Thunder
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Krista Clear at the Red Blocks concert about meeting Johnny Thunder.

Nimbus Station.name: Head to Gnarled Forest
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Hugo First by the launchpad in Gnarled Forest.

Nimbus Station.name: Hammer and Anvil
Nimbus Station.description: Get the Maelstrom Hammer from Gathermaster Klex in Forbidden Valley.

Nimbus Station.name: Rocket Builder
Nimbus Station.description: Build a new rocket using a Nimbus rocket part. You can drag a completed rocket into the Build Area to change its parts.

Nimbus Station.name: Venture League Specialty Kit
Nimbus Station.description: Open the Rank 1 Specialty Kit Package in your inventory, read the Rank 1 book, and equip every piece of your Specialty Kit.

Nimbus Station.name: Paradox Specialty Kit
Nimbus Station.description: Open the Rank 1 Specialty Kit Package in your inventory, read the Rank 1 book, and equip every piece of your Specialty Kit.

Nimbus Station.name: Sentinel Specialty Kit
Nimbus Station.description: Open the Rank 1 Specialty Kit Package in your inventory, read the Rank 1 book, and equip every piece of your Specialty Kit.

Nimbus Station.name: Assembly Specialty Kit
Nimbus Station.description: Open the Rank 1 Specialty Kit Package in your inventory, read the Rank 1 book, and equip every piece of your Specialty Kit.

Nimbus Station.name: Gate Keeper
Nimbus Station.description: Find Kurt Tussle, the Nexus Force Guard at Nimbus Station Race Place.

Nimbus Station.name: Make a Stink
Nimbus Station.description: Use your Water Sprayer on a Skunk and then tame it.

Nimbus Station.name: Avant Gardens Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 5 floating treasure chests in Avant Gardens.

Nimbus Station.name: Gnarled Forest Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 5 floating treasure chests in Gnarled Forest.

Nimbus Station.name: Pet Cove Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 5 floating treasure chests in Pet Cove.

Nimbus Station.name: Forbidden Valley Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 5 floating treasure chests in Forbidden Valley.

Nimbus Station.name: Exchange City
Nimbus Station.description: Use the Maelstrom Hammer on the red glowing anvil in Nimbus Plaza, Quick Build it and interact with the device to get Faction Tokens.

Nimbus Station.name: Notion for a Potion
Nimbus Station.description: Use Faction Tokens to buy a Paradox Power Potion from your Faction Vendor, then take the Potion back to Nexus Jay.

Nimbus Station.name: Of Vital Importance
Nimbus Station.description: Use Faction Tokens to buy a Venture Vitality Vial  from your Faction Vendor, then take the Vial back to Nexus Jay.

Nimbus Station.name: Aid Me!
Nimbus Station.description: Use Faction Tokens to buy some Assembly Awesome-Ade from your Faction Vendor, then take it back to Nexus Jay.

Nimbus Station.name: Clear Nimbus Rock!
Nimbus Station.description: Find a way to reach the Imagination Orb and clear the Property.

Nimbus Station.name: Starbase 3001 Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 5 floating treasure chests in Starbase 3001.

Nimbus Station.name: Dark Beat
Nimbus Station.description: Find 2 Drumsticks for Peppy Slapbiscuit at the Red Blocks concert in Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Peppy's Ugly Mug
Nimbus Station.description: Buy a replacement for Peppy's Ugly Mug from a vendor in Avant Gardens.

Nimbus Station.name: Nate is Missing!
Nimbus Station.description: Find Nate the Snake in Nimbus Plaza.

Nimbus Station.name: Crux Prime Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find all 8 floating treasure chests on Crux Prime.

Nimbus Station.name: Bone Deep
Nimbus Station.description: Use the Skeleton Dragon Pet to dig up 10 Bone Digs on Crux Prime, then take the bones back to Mardolf.

Nimbus Station.name: Smash Murgle Blotch!
Nimbus Station.description: Travel back in time and smash Murgle Blotch in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Smash Kinga Hurl!
Nimbus Station.description: Travel back in time and smash Kinga Hurl in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Smash Whack Bliddo!
Nimbus Station.description: Travel back in time and smash Whack Bliddo in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Smash the Four Riders!
Nimbus Station.description: Travel back in time and smash the Four Riders of the Maelstrom in the Battle of Nimbus Station.

Nimbus Station.name: Clear Nimbus Isle!
Nimbus Station.description: Find a way to reach the Imagination Orb and clear the Property.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Tower Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find the 15 floating treasure chests that Johnny Thunder hid in Nexus Tower.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Tower
Nimbus Station.description: Fly to Nexus Tower and talk to Nexus Naomi.

Nimbus Station.name: Ninjago Treasure Hunter
Nimbus Station.description: Find the 5 floating treasure chests that Johnny Thunder hid around the Ninjago Monastery.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Orders
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Orders
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Orders
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

Nimbus Station.name: Nexus Orders
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Nexus Jay in Nimbus Plaza.

Gnarled Forest.name: Bridge Out!
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a way across the ravine in Gnarled Forest and see if you can help the Pirates.

Gnarled Forest.name: Ooh Ooh Eee Eee!
Gnarled Forest.description: Give 5 bananas to Swabbie the Monkey atop Brig Rock in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Monarch of the Sea
Gnarled Forest.description: Score at least 25,000 points in the Cannon Cove Shooting Gallery.

Gnarled Forest.name: Collect Cannonballs
Gnarled Forest.description: Find 5 cannonballs. Check the bellies of the hanging sharks at the Pirates' Camp.

Gnarled Forest.name: Prove Yarrr Self
Gnarled Forest.description: Smash 10 Stromling Pirates in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Trigger Happy
Gnarled Forest.description: Talk to the mysterious shooter atop Brig Rock in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Working for Peanuts
Gnarled Forest.description: Shoot 5 infected crates in Gnarled Forest to destroy them.

Gnarled Forest.name: Find Renee Tombcrusher
Gnarled Forest.description: Find Renee Tombcrusher by the Maelstrom Trench in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Lily-Livered
Gnarled Forest.description: Help Arrrthur Arrrbuckle in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Siren Song
Gnarled Forest.description: Find the missing bricks and rebuild a Siren Stunner in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: What's the Commotion?
Gnarled Forest.description: Speak to Bert Scurvyburp at Brig Rock in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Jailkeep
Gnarled Forest.description: Feed the 4 prisoners at Brig Rock in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Feed Ninja Hashi
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a banana for Ninja Hashi in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Feed Ninja Mashi
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a banana for Ninja Mashi in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Feed Ninja Steve
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a banana for Ninja Steve in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Feed Ninja Zashi
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a banana for Ninja Zashi in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Fight the Admirals
Gnarled Forest.description: Smash 3 Stromling Admirals in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Block the Maelstrom
Gnarled Forest.description: Build 3 barricades below Brig Rock to stop Stromlings from spawning.

Gnarled Forest.name: Just Stunning
Gnarled Forest.description: Quick Build the Siren Stunner near the Maelstrom Trench to stun the Stromling Pirates.

Gnarled Forest.name: Free Ninja Hashi!
Gnarled Forest.description: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Hashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Free Ninja Mashi!
Gnarled Forest.description: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Mashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Free Ninja Steve!
Gnarled Forest.description: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Steve from the jail in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Free Ninja Zashi!
Gnarled Forest.description: Collect a head for the dummy. Then use the Maelstrom Hammer to free Ninja Zashi from the jail in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: X Marks the Spot
Gnarled Forest.description: Find the 3 missing Pirates in Forbidden Valley and recover the pieces of Captain Jack Knife's map.

Gnarled Forest.name: Jack Knife's Treasure
Gnarled Forest.description: Find Captain Jack Knife's missing treasure in Avant Gardens.

Gnarled Forest.name: Arrr is for Rocket!
Gnarled Forest.description: Go to Forbidden Valley and find 3 missing barrels.

Gnarled Forest.name: Loose Cannonballs
Gnarled Forest.description: Find 10 cannonballs for Black-Hearted Kevin in Gnarled Forest.

Gnarled Forest.name: Name Dropper
Gnarled Forest.description: Get an autographed picture from Johnny Thunder in Nimbus Station.

Gnarled Forest.name: Clear Chantey Shanty!
Gnarled Forest.description: Find a way to reach the Imagination Orb and clear the Property.

Gnarled Forest.name: Breadwinner
Gnarled Forest.description: Buy 3 Hardtack Biscuits from Burky Urchin and take them to Hugo First in Gnarled Forest.

Avant Gardens.name: Get Help!
Avant Gardens.description: Find Epsilon Starcracker in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Smash Or Be Smashed
Avant Gardens.description: Smash 15 Stromlings and report back to Epsilon Starcracker.

Avant Gardens.name: Spider Fighter
Avant Gardens.description: Smash Dark Spiderlings until you find 5 clues that might reveal where the Spider Queen is hiding.

Avant Gardens.name: Report In!
Avant Gardens.description: Report to Beck Strongheart at the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: Respect My Authority
Avant Gardens.description: Use the Speedchat button on the lower left, choose Actions and then choose Salute.

Avant Gardens.name: Fortify The Front
Avant Gardens.description: Smash and Quick Build 6 Stromling Mechs into turrets on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

Avant Gardens.name: Talk to Rusty
Avant Gardens.description: Pass through the tunnel to find the Monument and speak to Rusty Steele.

Avant Gardens.name: A Monumental View
Avant Gardens.description: Climb up the Monument to reach the road and talk to Vector Longview.

Avant Gardens.name: Finish Line
Avant Gardens.description: Quick Build the Finish Line to unlock the Monument Race.

Avant Gardens.name: Check In with Sky Lane
Avant Gardens.description: You saved Avant Gardens! Report to Sky Lane at the launch area in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Avant Gardens Air Strike
Avant Gardens.description: Rebuild a Satellite Beacon out on the battlefield.

Avant Gardens.name: Know Thy Enemy
Avant Gardens.description: Smash Stromlings and collect 25 Maelstrom-infected bricks for Wisp Lee.

Avant Gardens.name: A Real Hole in the Wall
Avant Gardens.description: Quick Build the wall at the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: Back-up Bulwark!
Avant Gardens.description: Fly to the Block Yard Property and provide back-up for Vance Bulwark.

Avant Gardens.name: Brick Collection
Avant Gardens.description: Smash lumber piles near the Monument to find bricks for the wall at the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: Secrets of the Maelstrom
Avant Gardens.description: Smash enemies and collect 15 Maelstrom-infected bricks. Then take them back to Wisp Lee.

Avant Gardens.name: Impress the Sentinel Faction
Avant Gardens.description: Interact with the Battle Tower to enter the Avant Gardens Survival challenge, then last for 1 minute. Survival requires 1 Green Imaginite.

Avant Gardens.name: Faction Time
Avant Gardens.description: Fly to Nimbus Station and talk to Nexus Jay, the Nexus Force Recruiter.

Avant Gardens.name: Hazmat Cleanup
Avant Gardens.description: Talk to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

Avant Gardens.name: Infested!
Avant Gardens.description: Talk to Crash Helmut at the infected Launch Area in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Sentinel Shine
Avant Gardens.description: Buy 3 cans of Armor Polish from Klaus Zett, the Gear Vendor, and return to Beck Strongheart.

Avant Gardens.name: To Arms!
Avant Gardens.description: Open your Backpack and equip your weapon. Then attack with it. To equip, click and drag the weapon onto yourself.

Avant Gardens.name: Arachnophobia
Avant Gardens.description: Smash the Spider Queen on Block Yard.

Avant Gardens.name: Stake a Claim
Avant Gardens.description: Interact with the Property Console to claim this Block Yard Property.

Avant Gardens.name: Model Mania
Avant Gardens.description: Find the Models tab in your Backpack and then place 4 models on your Property.

Avant Gardens.name: Model Movers
Avant Gardens.description: Pick up, rotate and put away a model on your Block Yard Property.

Avant Gardens.name: The Sentinel Shield
Avant Gardens.description: Buy a Sentinel Shield from Klaus Zett, the Gear Vendor in the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: Your Action Bar
Avant Gardens.description: Equip the Sentinel Shield, then press 3 or click on the new skill in your Action Bar to use it.

Avant Gardens.name: Pay to Play
Avant Gardens.description: Buy 10 Green Imaginite for Commander Beck Strongheart in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Return to the Venture Explorer
Avant Gardens.description: Use the launchpad to return to the Venture Explorer. Then check in with Epsilon Starcracker.

Avant Gardens.name: Slot Five
Avant Gardens.description: Drag the Maelstrom Vacuum onto slot 5 of your Action Bar. Then press 5 to activate the Vacuum.

Avant Gardens.name: Smash and Awe
Avant Gardens.description: Quick Build all 4 Satellite Beacons on the Avant Gardens battlefield.

Avant Gardens.name: Whatever It Takes
Avant Gardens.description: Survive for 3 minutes in the Avant Gardens Survival mini-game.

Avant Gardens.name: Spare Cannonballs
Avant Gardens.description: Collect 10 cannonballs for Sky Lane in Avant Gardens. Find them inside sharks in Gnarled Forest.

Avant Gardens.name: Clear Avant Grove!
Avant Gardens.description: Find a way to reach the Imagination Orb and clear the Property.

Avant Gardens.name: Do You Spinjitzu?
Avant Gardens.description: Interact with a mailbox to retrieve the Ninjago item from Cole, then give it back to Rocco Sirocco.

Avant Gardens.name: Seal of Approval
Avant Gardens.description: Report back to Epsilon Starcracker.

Avant Gardens.name: The Perils of Paradox
Avant Gardens.description: Talk to Wisp Lee at the destroyed Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Following the Trail
Avant Gardens.description: Use the Maelstrom Vacuum to collect 8 Maelstrom Samples. Follow the Spider Queen's trail behind the Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens.

Avant Gardens.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
Avant Gardens.description: Interact with the bricks in the cage to use the Maelstrom Cube on them and repeat Wisp's experiment.

Avant Gardens.name: Paradox Approval
Avant Gardens.description: Report to Epsilon Starcracker.

Avant Gardens.name: Agent Foxtrot
Avant Gardens.description: Report to Melodie Foxtrot by the caves behind the Paradox Lab in Avant Gardens to borrow Faction Gear.

Avant Gardens.name: Recon Report
Avant Gardens.description: Give the Spider Queen's location to Beck Strongheart at the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: Laser Rampage
Avant Gardens.description: Smash the fans and lasers on the Monument to collect 3 Flashlights and 4 Hamster Wheels.

Avant Gardens.name: Monumental Repairs
Avant Gardens.description: Quick Build 1 button, 1 bouncer, and 1 moving platform on the Monument.

Avant Gardens.name: Scarecrow
Avant Gardens.description: Scare 5 birds off of the top of the Monument.

Avant Gardens.name: Creepy Crawlies
Avant Gardens.description: Smash 10 Dark Spiderlings in the Avant Gardens caves.

Avant Gardens.name: A View to a Monument
Avant Gardens.description: Interact with the Binoculars at the end of the broken road to see a view of the Monument.

Avant Gardens.name: Borrowed Gear
Avant Gardens.description: Equip the Trial Faction Gear by dragging it from your backpack onto yourself.

Avant Gardens.name: Hall Pass
Avant Gardens.description: Talk to Theo Balfour in the tunnel behind the Sentinel Base Camp.

Avant Gardens.name: One Size Fits All
Avant Gardens.description: Find the Trial Faction Gear in your Backpack and equip it.

Forbidden Valley.name: Yes Sensei!
Forbidden Valley.description: Find Master Fong Shader at the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Ravencloud Gate
Forbidden Valley.description: Look for a secret path around Ravencloud Gate and talk to Kenjin the Wise.

Forbidden Valley.name: The Ninja Masters
Forbidden Valley.description: Find the 3 Ninja Masters in the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: The Cursed Cavalry
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash 5 Maelstrom Horsemen in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Pwnin' the Ronin
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash 10 Dark Ronin in Forbidden Valley. Wait until the Maelstrom has possessed the statues.

Forbidden Valley.name: Bell Buster
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash all 4 Bell Shrines in Forbidden Valley and retrieve the Hammer bricks.

Forbidden Valley.name: The Way of the Dragon
Forbidden Valley.description: Follow the Path of the Dragon to the Fallen Gate and defeat a Maelstrom Dragon on the far side. Work with your friends if need be.

Forbidden Valley.name: Stop the Horsemen!
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash the statues above the crypts on Cavalry Hill in Forbidden Valley, then rebuild them into turrets.

Forbidden Valley.name: Talk to Numb Chuck
Forbidden Valley.description: Use the Maelstrom Hammer to smash the anvil in the Great Tree. Then find a way to reach Numb Chuck.

Forbidden Valley.name: Sixteen Bricks
Forbidden Valley.description: Find 16 of these bricks and take them to Gathermaster Klex.

Forbidden Valley.name: Behind Enemy Lines
Forbidden Valley.description: Use your Hammer to smash the bars and talk to the imprisoned Ninjas in Gnarled Forest.

Forbidden Valley.name: Something in the Maelstrom
Forbidden Valley.description: Return to Master Fong Shader in the Great Tree in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Return the Stolen Treasure
Forbidden Valley.description: Use your Ninja Hood to sneak past the parrots in the Pirates' Camp and recover Numb Chuck's treasure.

Forbidden Valley.name: Study the Maelstrom
Forbidden Valley.description: Talk to Wisp Lee in Avant Gardens.

Forbidden Valley.name: Fearless Guards
Forbidden Valley.description: Get the Roar emote from Numb Chuck and use it to scare the guards in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Leading the Herd
Forbidden Valley.description: Lure 3 Maelstrom Horsemen up the hill and towards Brick Fury in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Power Pack
Forbidden Valley.description: Collect 30 Maelstrom-infected bricks and take them to Vapor Overcast at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Where Arrr We?
Forbidden Valley.description: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Georgie Timbershivers in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Ninja Disguise
Forbidden Valley.description: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Gary Grogowitz in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Pajama Parrrty
Forbidden Valley.description: Find some Pirate-Sized Ninja Clothes for Robbie Jibhanger in Forbidden Valley.

Forbidden Valley.name: Vapor Where?
Forbidden Valley.description: Deliver the scroll to Vapor Overcast by the Paradox Refinery. Equip a Ninja Hood to sneak through the Fallen Gate.

Forbidden Valley.name: Challenge of the Ronin
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash 20 statues in Forbidden Valley before the Dark Ronin appear.

Forbidden Valley.name: The System is Down
Forbidden Valley.description: Repair 3 Refinery pipes in Forbidden Valley. All 3 must remain intact at the same time for power to be restored.

Forbidden Valley.name: The Way of the Panda
Forbidden Valley.description: Interact with the Panda statue in the Great Tree, complete the Foot Race and then tame the Panda.

Forbidden Valley.name: Clear Raven Bluff!
Forbidden Valley.description: Find a way to reach the Imagination Orb and clear the Property.

Forbidden Valley.name: Slayer of Dragons
Forbidden Valley.description: Return to the Dragons' Lair in Forbidden Valley and defeat 3 Dragons.

Forbidden Valley.name: Hatching a Plan
Forbidden Valley.description: Talk to Brickmaster Clang about freeing the 4 Ninjas in Gnarled Forest.

Forbidden Valley.name: The Golden Treasures
Forbidden Valley.description: Kenjin the Wise in Forbidden Valley wants 10 bananas from Gnarled Forest.

Forbidden Valley.name: Secret of the Skeletons
Forbidden Valley.description: Build Echs Ray's console and then interact with it to analyze the Maelstrom Crystal.

Forbidden Valley.name: Skeleton Secret
Forbidden Valley.description: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.

Forbidden Valley.name: Chaos Cleaner
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash the Refinery pipes and Quick Build the Chaos Cleaner machine. Then interact with it to purify the Maelstrom Dagger.

Forbidden Valley.name: Purify DIY
Forbidden Valley.description: Give the Portable Chaos Cleaner Instructions to Jay in the Dojo of Lightning on Ninjago.

Nexus Tower.name: Anchor Management
Nexus Tower.description: Smash a Stromling Ape or Admiral in Gnarled Forest and bring Duke Exeter its anchor.

Nexus Tower.name: Old Made New
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Honor Accolade in the Sentinel vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: The Battle of Crux Prime
Nexus Tower.description: Go to Crux Prime and check in with Sgt. Brannan Landers.

Nexus Tower.name: Venture Forth
Nexus Tower.description: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm in his Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Hearty and Hael
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: The Way of Paradox
Nexus Tower.description: Follow the Paradox logos to find Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: Duke's Dark Alliance
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: To the Core
Nexus Tower.description: Follow the Assembly logos to find Dr. Overbuild.

Nexus Tower.name: A Series of Tubes
Nexus Tower.description: Quick Build 3 Imagination pipes in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: The Doctor is In
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core about a way to fight the Maelstrom.

Nexus Tower.name: Report for Duty!
Nexus Tower.description: Follow the Sentinel logos to find Duke Exeter in the Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Put Up Your Dukes
Nexus Tower.description: Use your combat skills to cause 25 points of damage in the Sentinel Faction Combat Challenge.

Nexus Tower.name: Running in the Halls
Nexus Tower.description: Use each Faction's shortcut devices in Nexus Tower, then return to Trek Furino.

Nexus Tower.name: Pieces of Eight
Nexus Tower.description: Collect the 8 compasses in the Venture League Map Room of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Burst Pipes
Nexus Tower.description: Quick Build 4 Imagination pipes around Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Is It Safe?
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Duke Exeter, Vanda Darkflame and Hael Storm about a Safe, find the pieces and then talk to Dr. Overbuild.

Nexus Tower.name: Safe as Houses
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Beck Strongheart in Avant Gardens about a housing for your Property Safe.

Nexus Tower.name: Lock Step
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Captain Jack Knife in Gnarled Forest about a lock for your Property Safe.

Nexus Tower.name: Secrets are Safe
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Numb Chuck in Forbidden Valley about a functionator device for your Property Safe.

Nexus Tower.name: Assembling It All
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Dr. Overbuild again to see if he's done with your Safe.

Nexus Tower.name: Mysterious Pet
Nexus Tower.description: Speak to Neido in the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.

Nexus Tower.name: Build-a-Beastie
Nexus Tower.description: Activate the Paradox Pet-o-Matic to rebuild the Alien Creature, then tame it.

Nexus Tower.name: Luxuriant Purple
Nexus Tower.description: Collect 10 Maelstrom Samples from Skeleton Miners and Engineers on Crux Prime, then take them to Rutger Hemoglobin in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Compass Crisis
Nexus Tower.description: Search Nexus Tower for Trek Furino's 15 missing compasses.

Nexus Tower.name: Vault Account
Nexus Tower.description: Interact with the Vault terminal in Nexus Tower to open your account.

Nexus Tower.name: Sentinel Scrubdown
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Soap Gun to clean up 5 dirt clouds in the Sentinel area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Assembly Ablutions
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Soap Gun to clean up 7 dirt clouds in the Assembly area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Paradox Polish
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Soap Gun to clean up 5 dirt clouds in the Paradox area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Power in the Tower
Nexus Tower.description: Repair the 7 overcharged power panels in the Paradox area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Water Friends For
Nexus Tower.description: Collect some clean water from a drinking fountain in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Hallway Hygiene
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Soap Gun to clean up 7 dirt clouds throughout the hallways of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Property Scanner
Nexus Tower.description: Build the Property Scanning Device on any Property world, then return to Dr. Overbuild.

Nexus Tower.name: Loosed from the Roost
Nexus Tower.description: Find all 10 of Hael Storm's escaped parrots in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: The Heart of Darkness
Nexus Tower.description: Use Vanda Darkflame's Shadow Orb to look into the Maelstrom.

Nexus Tower.name: Forbidden Trophies
Nexus Tower.description: Retrieve 5 Cracked Ronin's Helms and 1 Splintered Lance from enemies in Forbidden Valley. Return them to Duke Exeter in Nexus Tower

Nexus Tower.name: Spying on Sentinel
Nexus Tower.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to spy on Duke Exeter while wearing a Sentinel Box Disguise. Buy the disguise from Sutoro Hatto.

Nexus Tower.name: Assembly Eavesdrop
Nexus Tower.description: Buy an Assembly Box Disguise from Sutoro Hatto, then wear it to spy on Dr. Overbuild. Report to Vanda to tell her what you hear.

Nexus Tower.name: Venture League Stakeout
Nexus Tower.description: Buy a Venture League Box Disguise from Sutoro Hatto, then wear it to spy on Hael Storm. Report back to Vanda to tell her what you hear.

Nexus Tower.name: Nexus Force Vault
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room to open a Vault account.

Nexus Tower.name: Hidden and Dangerous
Nexus Tower.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about a Venture League pet.

Nexus Tower.name: Prehistoric Pet
Nexus Tower.description: Interact with the bowl in the Venture League Observatory, then tame the Stegosaurus pet.

Nexus Tower.name: In Pursuit of a Pet
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about an Assembly pet.

Nexus Tower.name: Saber-Toothed Nuisance
Nexus Tower.description: Tame the Saber Cat in the Assembly Storeroom in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: The Perfect Paradox Pet
Nexus Tower.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about a Paradox pet.

Nexus Tower.name: Apologies to Olivia
Nexus Tower.description: Deliver Rutger Hemoglobin's apology to Olivia Nightshade in the Paradox Vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Hexed and Vexed
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Rutger Hemoglobin in the Paradox Vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Paging Dr. Overbuild
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core about a cure for Rutger Hemoglobin.

Nexus Tower.name: Imagination is the Cure
Nexus Tower.description: Equip the Imagination Backpack and charge it at the Beam. Then activate it near Rutger Hemoglobin.

Nexus Tower.name: Nexus Force Vault
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room to open a Vault account.

Nexus Tower.name: Nexus Force Vault
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room to open a Vault account.

Nexus Tower.name: Nexus Force Vault
Nexus Tower.description: Use the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room to open a Vault account.

Nexus Tower.name: I Have the Power!
Nexus Tower.description: Find 5 blue X-marks on Crux Prime and then use Duke's sword to call down Imagination Blasts.

Nexus Tower.name: Meyer's Cap Collection
Nexus Tower.description: Talk to Olivia Nightshade in the Paradox vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Witches' Brew
Nexus Tower.description: Return the shield to Achilles Plutarch in the Sentinel vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: High Score
Nexus Tower.description: Return the jetpack to Ace Warprider in the Venture League vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Hair Beyond Compare
Nexus Tower.description: Return the hair gel to Rutger Hemoglobin in the Paradox vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Sharing Ideas
Nexus Tower.description: Return the Thinking Hat to Meyer Muckrake in the Paradox Laboratory in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Smoke and Mirrors
Nexus Tower.description: Return the smoke machine to Gwen Tweenbangle in the Assembly vendor area of Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Scrubby Bubbles
Nexus Tower.description: Get some hiccup tablets from Mr. Ree in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Potion Commotion
Nexus Tower.description: Buy a Super Notion Potion from Olivia Nightshade in the Paradox vendor area of Nexus Tower, then return to the Nexus Naomi console.

Nexus Tower.name: Target Locked
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Maelstrom Missiles
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Valorous Vanda
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Find the Fragments
Nexus Tower.description: Gather the 8 chunks of the Imagimeter Base from red Venture Koi wreckage on Crux Prime.

Nexus Tower.name: Discourse with Duke
Nexus Tower.description: Dr. Overbuild wants you to speak to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Have No Fear!
Nexus Tower.description: Duke wants you to return to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: Dangerous Darkflame
Nexus Tower.description: Dr. Overbuild wants you to speak to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: Fall and Recoil
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: Occidental Orienteer
Nexus Tower.description: Dr. Overbuild wants you to speak to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Parley with the Pirate
Nexus Tower.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to speak to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Compass Courier
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: The Pirates Reply
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: A Second Opinion
Nexus Tower.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to speak to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: Build Up for Battle
Nexus Tower.description: Dr. Overbuild wants you to talk to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Betrayed and Waylaid
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: Ask the Duke
Nexus Tower.description: Vanda Darkflame wants you to speak to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: The Baron's Folly
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: Assistance from the Agents
Nexus Tower.description: Report to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Cooling the Fury
Nexus Tower.description: Charge your Imagination Backpack and use it to cool down Brick Fury in Forbidden Valley.

Nexus Tower.name: Hael's Dark Flame
Nexus Tower.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

Nexus Tower.name: Darkflame's Denial
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Duke's Discovery
Nexus Tower.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Don't Be Koi
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Dr. Overbuild, I Presume?
Nexus Tower.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

Nexus Tower.name: Nothing to See Here
Nexus Tower.description: Return to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

Nexus Tower.name: Duke's Dire Straits
Nexus Tower.description: Hael Storm wants you to talk to Duke Exeter in the Sentinel Command Center.

Nexus Tower.name: Deliver the Dish
Nexus Tower.description: Dr. Overbuild needs a Dish 6x6 Inverted from Axon Klaxon in the Assembly Storeroom in Nexus Tower.

Nexus Tower.name: Fizzy Busy
Nexus Tower.description: Take the hiccup tablets back to the Nexus Naomi console in the Sentinel War Room.

Nexus Tower.name: The Imagimeter Base
Nexus Tower.description: Quick Build the broken Imagimeter Base by Hael Storm.

Nexus Tower.name: Pure Chaos
Nexus Tower.description: Show the Maelstrom Dagger to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

Crux Prime.name: The Mysterious Ninja
Crux Prime.description: Speak to the mysterious Ninja in the Ruins beyond the Skeletons' canyon on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: The Art of Spinjitzu
Crux Prime.description: Hold the attack button to charge your new Spinjitzu weapon - then release to unleash Spinjitzu. Show me now!

Crux Prime.name: The Power of Spinjitzu
Crux Prime.description: Use Spinjitzu to smash 10 Skeleton Miners in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: The Scrolls of Ninjago
Crux Prime.description: Search Crux Prime until you find all 10 of Neido's scrolls.

Crux Prime.name: The Legend of Ninjago
Crux Prime.description: Interact with Neido's shrine to read his scrolls.

Crux Prime.name: Bone Fractures
Crux Prime.description: Use a ranged weapon to destroy 10 of the Skeletons' Bone Fracture Bombs in the Maelstrom Quarry.

Crux Prime.name: Bang Your Skulls!
Crux Prime.description: Smash and then rebuild 3 Skeleton Growlspeakers in the Maelstrom Quarry.

Crux Prime.name: Destroy the Drill!
Crux Prime.description: Smash a Skeleton Drilling Rig in the Maelstrom Quarry. Use Spinjitzu to reveal its weakness!

Crux Prime.name: Skeleton Tech
Crux Prime.description: Topple Skeleton Watchtowers, smash the Skeleton Watchmen that fall out, then collect 6 schematic pages.

Crux Prime.name: Nuckal Cracker
Crux Prime.description: Find a Maelstrom Crystal by smashing Nuckal, the Skeleton General on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: For All the Tea in Ninjago
Crux Prime.description: Water 10 Aura Blossoms on Crux Prime and bring the petals to Neido.

Crux Prime.name: Dropship Down!
Crux Prime.description: Find Sherland Powers, the Nexus Force Pilot, somewhere on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: Battle Weary
Crux Prime.description: Buy a BBQ Drumstick from the vendor wandering Crux Prime, then take it back to Sherland Powers.

Crux Prime.name: Black Box
Crux Prime.description: Find the ship's computer and rebuild it until it's back aboard the dropship. Then recover the data.

Crux Prime.name: Off the Hooks
Crux Prime.description: Smash 15 Stromling Admirals on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: Shield Zones
Crux Prime.description: Quick Build 1 Shield Generator on Crux Prime. Work with other minifigures to complete the build.

Crux Prime.name: Tea Time
Crux Prime.description: Take some of Neido's Imagination Tea to Brannan Landers on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: Goodbye Griffy
Crux Prime.description: Smash Skeleton Pit Bosses on Crux Prime until you find Neido's Hello Griffy doll.

Crux Prime.name: Bomb Squad
Crux Prime.description: Smash 5 downed missiles on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: Engineers of Destruction
Crux Prime.description: Smash 3 Skeleton Engineers in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

Crux Prime.name: Skullduggery
Crux Prime.description: Perform a Pet Dig at the far end of the Maelstrom Quarry, then tame the Pet that appears.

Crux Prime.name: Bony Little Thing
Crux Prime.description: Go to Pet Cove and talk to Coalessa about the Skeleton Dragon Pet.

Crux Prime.name: Dark Science
Crux Prime.description: Take the Maelstrom Crystal to Echs Ray, the Paradox Scientist in Forbidden Valley.

Crux Prime.name: Wreckage of the Koi
Crux Prime.description: Smash 10 pieces of wreckage from the Venture Koi.

Crux Prime.name: I Am the Egg Man
Crux Prime.description: Talk to Coalessa in Pet Cove about the egg.

Forbidden Valley.name: Faster! Faster!
Forbidden Valley.description: Beat Zip Lash's race time of 4:05 during a race at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack.

Forbidden Valley.name: Quick as a Lash
Forbidden Valley.description: Beat Zip Lash's lap time of 1:27 during a race at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack.

Forbidden Valley.name: Dragonmaw Chasm Victory
Forbidden Valley.description: Win a race of 3 or more players at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack.

Forbidden Valley.name: Dragonmaw Top 3
Forbidden Valley.description: Finish in 3rd place or better during a race of 3 or more at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack.

Forbidden Valley.name: Nerves of Steel
Forbidden Valley.description: Complete a race at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack without wrecking.

Forbidden Valley.name: Dragonscourge
Forbidden Valley.description: Smash 10 Dragon Eggs during a race at the Dragonmaw Chasm racetrack.

Nimbus Station.name: Get Ready to Race!
Nimbus Station.description: Buy a Car Chassis from Ludwig Clutchburn at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

Nimbus Station.name: Build Your Ride!
Nimbus Station.description: Interact with the car hologram on the Build Area to build a car.

Nimbus Station.name: Enter a Race
Nimbus Station.description: Drag a car model from your Backpack to the Race Activator to start the event.

Nimbus Station.name: Speed Boost!
Nimbus Station.description: Collect 9 Imagination Orbs during a race, then press spacebar to Boost.

Nimbus Station.name: Vertigo Loop Top 3
Nimbus Station.description: Finish in 3rd place or better during a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.

Nimbus Station.name: Max Velocity
Nimbus Station.description: Beat Velocity Lane's lap time of 1:10 during a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.

Nimbus Station.name: Vertigo Loop Victory
Nimbus Station.description: Win a race at the Vertigo Loop racetrack.

Nimbus Station.name: Find Swifty McGurk
Nimbus Station.description: Talk to Swifty McGurk at the Race Place in Gnarled Forest.

Nimbus Station.name: Race Series 1
Nimbus Station.description: Win 1 race each at the Vertigo Loop and Keelhaul Canyon racetracks.

Gnarled Forest.name: No Wreckin'
Gnarled Forest.description: Complete a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack without wrecking.

Gnarled Forest.name: Keelhaul Canyon Top 3
Gnarled Forest.description: Finish in 3rd place or better during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

Gnarled Forest.name: Swifty's Best Lap
Gnarled Forest.description: Beat Swifty McGurk's best lap time of 1:40 during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

Gnarled Forest.name: Swifty's Best Time
Gnarled Forest.description: Beat Swifty McGurk's best race time of 5:00 during a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

Gnarled Forest.name: Keelhaul Canyon Victory
Gnarled Forest.description: Win a race at the Keelhaul Canyon racetrack.

Gnarled Forest.name: That Velocity Lass
Gnarled Forest.description: Speak to Velocity Lane at the Nimbus Station Race Place.

LUPs.name: Deliver the Welder
LUPs.description: Unit 32 can't complete the sculpture without a welder!

LUPs.name: Stop the Infected Citizens
LUPs.description: I hope we can contain the spread of the corruption.

LUPs.name: Stop the Separator
LUPs.description: Oh dear, the longer it takes to stop the Separators, the more law abiding Citizens will be disassembled!

LUPs.name: Hare Today
LUPs.description: Those Maelstrom Beavers can be difficult sometimes. Watch out, they may bite!

LUPs.name: Trapped
LUPs.description: Folks here say that it is not usually this cold or snowy, it must be due to lake effect. Any luck finding those snow shoes?

LUPs.name: Hungry
LUPs.description: Any luck finding those carrots? I wonder if anyone knows where to find them.

LUPs.name: The Silicone Express
LUPs.description: Deliver the circuit board to the Robot 2by3.

LUPs.name: I love the smell of Imaginatium in the morning
LUPs.description: Collect 5 Imaginatium fuel rods for me.

LUPs.name: Travel to the Stars
LUPs.description: Talk to Forge Honcho in Starbase 3001.

LUPs.name: Crazy Snails
LUPs.description: It's great that you're helping us. There are still more shells to smash. Look high and low. They are sneaky and shy.

LUPs.name: Hidden Flies
LUPs.description: You havent found all of the bug boxes yet, keep on looking, they like to hide.

LUPs.name: Key to the Stars
LUPs.description: Once you have the Starfly key, climb to the top of the mountain and release the Starflies.

Venture Instance.name: Data Disaster!
Venture Instance.description: Collect all 10 Datacards aboard the Venture Explorer.

Venture Instance.name: Hammer the Hammers
Venture Instance.description: Smash 25 Hammer Stromlings aboard the Venture Explorer.

Venture Instance.name: Robot Rampage
Venture Instance.description: Smash 6 Corrupted Sentry robots aboard the Venture Explorer.

Venture Instance.name: Another Bug Hunt
Venture Instance.description: Smash 3 Elite Dark Spiderlings aboard the Venture Explorer.

Venture Instance.name: Do You Speak Chaos?
Venture Instance.description: Collect data from 10 consoles aboard the Venture Explorer.

Venture Instance.name: Get Out of Here!
Venture Instance.description: Return to Sky Lane in Avant Gardens.
